org.usfirst.frc.team3997.robot.controllers

Class ArmController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SendableBase
      • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
        • org.usfirst.frc.team3997.robot.controllers.ArmController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Sendable

    public class ArmController
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
    Controls arm and intake behavior
    Author:
    Peter I. Chacko, Eric Warner, John Sullivan Jr, Jake Boothby, Elliot Friedlander

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ArmController.ArmState
      Enum that lets us shift our status from init to teleop and vice versa

      Boolean for collapsing intake

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArmController

        public ArmController(RobotModel robot,
                     RemoteControl humanControl)

        Constructor for ArmController

        Actions:

        • Initializes instance variables
        • Sets toggle booleans to false
        • Initializes PID Source and takes in arm encoder as a parameter
        • Initializes PID output and takes in robot
        • Initializes PID Controllers and takes in ARM_P, ARM_I, ARM_D, ARM_F, ARM_PID_SOURCE, ARM_PID_OUTPUT
        • Sets ArmState to kInitialize
        Parameters:
        RobotModel - robot
        RemoteControl - humanControl
